blog.name: 37northstorm
blog.title: North Storm Tales
blog.description:
I'm a student who dream to live in a lighthouse.
♡ Music, notes, books, nature and cold weather.

body:
The Three Brothers Sisters

Ok, we get that Dumbledore is death and Snape, Voldemort and Harry are the three brothers. But what about the black sisters? Bellatrix wanted power in the Elder Wand. Andromeda wanted love in the Resurrection Stone. Narcissa was the invisible housewife of Lucius. What did they all have in common? Harry.

summary: HANNAHHHH!!! I came back from camp to my favorite lesbians broken up. *sigh* Dorcas, honey, I know everyone is mad at you, but...
question: HANNAHHHH!!! I came back from camp to my favorite lesbians broken up. *sigh* Dorcas, honey, I know everyone is mad at you, but if you need to talk, I'm here. Alright, love? Same for you Marlene.
answer:
((OOC: I’m terribly sorry  😇))

Dorcas: Thank you.

Marlene: That’s sweet of you, thanks.

title: A Shameful Encounter
body:
by AnnaOnTheMoon

Snape reflects on what happened when he wakes up to discover Ginny in his bed and thinks about the consequences. Takes place during Deathly Hallows.

Words: 684, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply, Underage
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Ginny Weasley, Severus Snape
  • Relationships: Severus Snape/Ginny Weasley, Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Lily Evans Potter/Severus Snape
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Underage Sex, Hurt/Comfort, professor and student

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: so when i was younger and played sims 2 more than i did literally anything else (as opposed to now, where i have more refined...
body:
so when i was younger and played sims 2 more than i did literally anything else (as opposed to now, where i have more refined tastes and switched to sims 3)i downloaded custom lots for the burrow and the riddle house

what i didn’t know was that the riddle house was the most haunted lot in the game

summary: The True Hogwarts Mystery How did I manage to win both challenges, you may ask. The answer is, who the fuck knows. But I’m...
caption:
The True Hogwarts Mystery

How did I manage to win both challenges, you may ask.

The answer is, who the fuck knows. But I’m happy, life’s good.

Also, they learnt n o t h i n g from the massive wave of criticism regarding ridiculous prices and overpowered opponents. I’m out, gurl bye.

summary: So I have this Harry Potter idea that is nagging me...
body:
So I have this Harry Potter idea that is nagging me…

It’s definitely not going to be written yet. I want finish my other projects first. But it’s based around and American Auror coming to seek Harry’s help in finding her brother who has traveled down a dark and destructive path.

He doesn’t just agree of course. He isn’t a fool.

However, after much persuasion, he’s convinced. He, Ron, and somehow Hermione go an amazing adventure to America’s wrizarding world. Harry begins to realize again for the first time since setting foot into Hogwarts that magic is so much more than waving a wand. Even Hermione is impressed learning knew theories and finding out that not all stories are fictional.

….

So here’s the question, is this something any of you lovely people would be interested in reading? Lemme know!

<3

blog.name: xxravensfromwinterfellxx
blog.title: !So Drarry!
blog.description: Punk rock kid with a thing or two For Las Vegas, emo bands and everything batman

summary: Drarry Pet Peeves (OMG) [these are my opinions and no one is obliged to agree okay?} >Harry starting to care less about Hermione...
body:
Drarry Pet Peeves (OMG)

[these are my opinions and no one is obliged to agree okay?}

>Harry starting to care less about Hermione and Ron and spending way more time with Draco and not particularly caring about them. Excuse me, but Harry would never do that. Ugh. I have seen this one ruining great stories.

>Harry literally falling for Draco in the first paragraphs, NO! They hate each other and that can’t just change like poof! they are in love. I know everyone doesn’t write slow-build stuff but some development? some? It gives more value to what happens in the story.

>Pinning Harry, always and every time. Why is always that Harry is ready to accept that they are in love and that is it okay if anyone knows. It is okay sometimes but this is literally every story, can’t Draco some times feel jealous and possessive, can’t Harry be reluctant in accepting that he wants Draco. CAN’T DRACO MAKE SACRIFICES SOMETIMES?!

>Sub!Draco stories where Draco right away agrees that he likes being submissive and forgets all that’s ever been taught to him and not even slightly hesitant. Um, hello he is a fucking Malfoy!

> Dumbledore bashing, Um no, I know he was manipulative and all but he cared for Hogwarts and the rest, he died for them damn it and Harry respected him a lot, Harry could be angsty and all for Dumbledore not telling him enough but still he respects the man and would never speak ill of him.

 > And lastly, ugh this bugs me, I know that Draco is pale and pretty and has a great ass and all but why the hell does everyone forget that harry is Hawt, like everyone take a good look at him and realize that he is extremely handsome and don’t just neglect this. *Pets Harry’s messy black Harry* Its okay baby.

> Dumbledore bashing, Um no, I know he was manipulative and all but he cared for Hogwarts and the rest, he died for them damn it and Harry respected him a lot, Harry could be angsty and all for Dumbledore not telling him enough but still he respects the man and would never speak ill of him.

blog.name: notyoursterotypicalnerd
blog.title: NotYourSterotypicalNerd
blog.description:
I'm a cosplayer with a habit of falling in love with various fandoms. 
Disclaimer THE THINGS I POST  DO NOT BELONG TO ME UNLESS STATED OTHERWISE.

title: Harry Potter Masterlist
body:
Main Masterlist

Marvel Masterlist

Supernatural Masterlist 

DC Masterlist 

Celebrities Masterlist 

Sherlock Masterlist

To make my Masterlist a little more organised and easier to sort through..I thought I’d create sub-masterlists..All of these Masterlist will be updated whenever I post a new story.

Bellamort (Bellatrix Lestrange x Lord Voldemort):

Loving you is like setting a forest on fire, Dangerous but tameable.

Dramione (Hermione Granger x Draco Malfoy):

Things Change

Agreement

By The Sea

Drarry ( Draco Malfoy x Harry Potter):

A love like no other

Lily Potter x Severus Snape:

Why Her? Why Not Me?

Severus Snape x Hermione Granger:

This story isn’t told through generations, this is a story told between us.
